title: Debian shell
command: /bin/bash -c 'curl -L -o docker-compose.yml https://feeds.toradex.com/portainer/colibri-imx8x/docker-compose.yml && docker-compose -p shell up -d shell && exit'
note: Image size is ~70MB. It may take some time to pull on the first-use.
